verses.verse: <S%H835>Blessed<s%> is he whose <S%H6588>disobedience<s%> is <S%H5375>forgiven,<s%> whose <S%H2401>sin<s%> is <S%H3680>covered.<s%>
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> to whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2803>doesn't<s%> impute <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> in whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> there is no <S%H7423>deceit.<s%>
When I kept <S%H2790>silence,<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> wasted <S%H1086>away<s%> through my <S%H7581>groaning<s%> all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>

For <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on <S%H3955>me.<s%> My strength was <S%H2015>sapped<s%> in the <S%H2725>heat<s%> of <S%H7019>summer.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

I <S%H3045>acknowledged<s%> my <S%H2403>sin<s%> to <S%H3680>you.<s%> I didn't hide my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H3034>confess<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and you <S%H5375>forgave<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

For <S%H2623>this,<s%> let everyone who is godly <S%H6419>pray<s%> to you in a <S%H6256>time<s%> when you may be <S%H4672>found.<s%> Surely when the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7858>overflow,<s%> they shall not reach to <S%H5060>him.<s%>

You are my hiding <S%H5643>place.<s%> You will <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me from <S%H6862>trouble.<s%> You will <S%H5437>surround<s%> me with <S%H7438>songs<s%> of <S%H6405>deliverance.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I will <S%H7919>instruct<s%> you and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> you shall <S%H3212>go.<s%> I will <S%H3289>counsel<s%> you with my eye on <S%H5869>you.<s%>

<S%H5483>Don't<s%> be like the horse, or like the <S%H6505>mule,<s%> which have no <S%H995>understanding,<s%> <S%H5716>who<s%> are <S%H1102>controlled<s%> by <S%H4964>bit<s%> and <S%H7448>bridle,<s%> or <S%H1077>else<s%> they will not come near to <S%H7126>you.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> <S%H4341>sorrows<s%> come to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> but loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> shall <S%H5437>surround<s%> him who <S%H982>trusts<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H1523>rejoice,<s%> you <S%H6662>righteous!<s%> <S%H7442>Shout<s%> for <S%H3477>joy,<s%> all you who are upright in <S%H3820>heart!<s%>
